claim: Constantine has zero plot elements taken from the "Dangerous Habits" story arc.
premise_source_doc_sentence: With a screenplay by Kevin Brodbin and Frank Cappello , the film is based on DC Comics ' Hellblazer comic book , with plot elements taken from the `` Dangerous Habits '' story arc  (  issues # 4146  )  and the `` Original Sins '' story arc .

claim: Constantine has zero plot elements taken from the "Dangerous Habits" story arc.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The `` Dangerous Habits '' story arc was written by Garth Ennis in 1991 .
